homePrize: What is the price of the home?
downpayment: How much are you looking to put down?
apr: What is the Annual Percentage Rate (APR)?
loanLength: How many years do you want to have the loan for?
invalidAPR: Enter a valid Annual Percentage Rate.
invalidDuration: Enter a valid number for loan duration.
again: Do you want to calculate another loan? (y/n)
bye: Thank you for using our serice. Have a nice day!
